name: Ocean Buddy 2
description:
A sequal to Ocean Buddy. Lat time your friend got you a present now you want to return the favor and give them some suvaniors from your vacation trip. 

Collect as many starfishes and shells as you can.

Stay away from Jellyfishes or they will take your gifts

Once done, find the orange blocks and that will take  you to back home to you r friend.
